title: Small and Medium Sized Enterprises in MENA: Leveraging Growth Finance for Sustainable Development
summary: This study assesses the state of the "Missing Middle" to better understand their needs and the challenges they face. It addresses how governments and other stakeholders can help them reach their potential for growth and job creation to positively impact the MENA region. Commissioned by the Citi Foundation and Shell Foundation, the new research is based on in-depth interviews with over 200 public and private leaders and SMEs in Saudi Arabia, Jordan, UAE and Egypt.
